books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Mark Greaney
books.description: President Jack Ryan detects a pattern in outbreaks of violence around the world that point to the Russian president, but he must unite the Western allies before he can take action.
books.name: TOM CLANCY: COMMANDER IN CHIEF

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross returns home, for the first time in 35 years, to help a cousin who has been accused of murder.
books.name: CROSS JUSTICE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch reluctantly helps his half brother, a defense attorney, and his investigations lead him inside the L.A.P.D.
books.name: THE CROSSING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hit man Will Robie investigates murder charges against his estranged father in their Mississippi hometown.
books.name: THE GUILTY

books.author: by J. R. Ward
books.description: While attending the Black Dagger Brotherhood's rigorous training program, Paradise falls for a commoner.
books.name: BLOOD KISS

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Harper Lee
books.description: In the mid-1950s, a grown-up Jean Louise Finch returns to Maycomb and realizes that her adored father is a racist.
books.name: GO SET A WATCHMAN

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: Stephanie Plum pursues a fraternity member arrested for beating up a college dean and investigates a murder.
books.name: TRICKY TWENTY-TWO

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: When a wealthy, charming man who has been an absent father dies, he leaves bequests specifically tailored to help his three daughters and troubled son achieve their dreams, and a special gift for his former wife.
books.name: PRECIOUS GIFTS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A couple in love are threatened by secrets from the past.
books.name: SEE ME

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Twenty stories, some never before published.
books.name: THE BAZAAR OF BAD DREAMS

books.author: by Mary Kubica
books.description: When the daughter of a prominent Chicago family is kidnapped and returned with no memory of her experience, her mother and a detective try to understand what has happened.
books.name: THE GOOD GIRL

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE
